languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс встряхивает головой, словно отгоняя мучительную грезу.{/n} "Довольно. Я не услышу ничего, что хоть сколько-то меня обнадежит".
{n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс встряхивает головой, словно отгоняя мучительную грезу.{/n} "Довольно. Я не услышу ничего, что хоть сколько-то меня обнадежит".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. I am not going to hear anything that is going to give me any hope."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. I am not going to hear anything that is going to give me any hope."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは耐え難い夢を追い払うかのように頭を振った。{/n}「もう十分だ。俺は希望を与えるような言葉にはもう一切耳を貸さない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは耐え難い夢を追い払うかのように頭を振った。{/n}「もう十分だ。俺は希望を与えるような言葉にはもう一切耳を貸さない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希摇了摇头，仿佛在赶走痛苦的梦魇一样。{/n}“算了，无论你说什么，我都不想听了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希摇了摇头，仿佛在赶走痛苦的梦魇一样。{/n}“算了，我已经不打算再抱什么希望了。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sacude la cabeza como si espantara una terrible pesadilla.{/n} «Basta. Nada de lo que diga servirá para tranquilizarme».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sacude la cabeza como si espantara una terrible pesadilla.{/n} «Basta. No pienso oír nada que pueda darme esperanzas».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf, wie um einen quälenden Traum zu verscheuchen.{/n} "Genug. Nichts, was ich höre, wird mich beschwichtigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix schüttelt den Kopf, wie um einen quälenden Traum zu verscheuchen.{/n} "Genug. Ich werde nichts hören, was mir irgendeine Hoffnung schenkt."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête comme pour chasser un mauvais rêve.{/n} « Inutile. Rien de ce que vous me direz ne pourra me redonner espoir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix secoue la tête comme pour chasser un mauvais rêve.{/n} « Inutile. Rien de ce que vous me direz ne pourra me redonner espoir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, acı verici bir kâbustan uyanmaya çalışırcasına başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Beni rahatlatman mümkün değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix shakes his head as if chasing away an excruciating dream.{/n} "Enough. Nothing I hear will reassure me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, acı verici bir kâbustan uyanmaya çalışırcasına başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Yeter. Dediklerinle içim rahatlamıyor."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
